name: Damn Bats
description:
Jump all platforms to the end of the level. Avoid or get impulse in some annoying bats. There is a virtual cat stuck in the tree, will you jump all the level to save him?

CONTROLS:
[A] or [Left Arrow] to go left
[D] or [Right Arrow] to go right
[W] or [Up Arrow] or [Space] to Jump

This is a submission to Game Jam +, from Santa Catarina, Brazil.

Team Name: Damn Bats

Team members:
Cainã Correa Caldas @TailsGameDev
Lucas Podgurski @podgurski
Luiz Barone @luizbaronemusic

ii)
Theme: Easy to play, Hard to be good
